i watch basketball.

participant_2.background:
I wake up early and listen to Ween to get my creative juices flowing.
my name is mary and i m from colorado.
I got my teaching license last year.
i like to sit on couch all day.
i hope to one day be happy with myself.

content.text: Great! Just woke up, ready for the week!
Nice! What are you looking forward to?
I'm looking forward to my teaching job, I got my license last year and I'm starting in the fall!
That's so awesome! Congrats! I've always wanted to be a teacher. What do you want to teach?
I want to teach 3rd grade. I love kids and I think it's so important to give them a good foundation for their education.
I love kids too! I have a 6 year old son. He's a handful but he's so cute.
Aw, that's so sweet! I'm sure he's going to love having you as his teacher.
Thanks! Me too. I want to make sure he has a great experience in school.
I'm sure you'll do a great job!
